PS4 PUP Extractor

This tools allows you extract data and infromation from the PS4 PUP files (PS4UPDAT.PUP). Also it shows file information with a list of the files that compose the PUP file. This tool includes an option to extract all the subfiles with information about them such as the offset and size.

PS4 PUP Extractor:

The download is available in this link: Download.
